backend/main.mo: Defines the core backend actor with user profiles, jobs, applications, chat, payouts, access control, and helper logic for role checks and job participation.
backend/migration.mo: Handles state migration by adding phone numbers to profiles and workersNeeded to jobs while preserving existing data maps.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence mapping features to frontend files, components, and test IDs for tracking implementation status.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of all major frontend files, including pages, hooks, and components.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS variables and styles using a warm OKLCH color palette with light and dark mode support.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint that loads the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and root authentication/role-selection flow wrapped in a themed application container.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper with navbar, main content container, and footer including the caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button using Internet Identity with login/logout handling and React Query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/NavBar.tsx: Role-aware navigation bar showing links for home, jobs, profile, and owner-only job creation, plus login/logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Combines identity, actor, and profile queries to expose the current user, role, and loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, jobs, applications, chat messages, and payouts via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and custom warm-themed CSS variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AuthPage.tsx: Login page that prompts users to authenticate with Internet Identity and redirects when logged in.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Displays job-specific chat messages and allows sending messages between job owners and workers.
frontend/src/pages/CreateJobPage.tsx: Form page for owners to create new jobs with validation and backend submission.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Dashboard showing personalized job stats for owners and workers and links to manage or explore jobs.
frontend/src/pages/JobDetailsPage.tsx: Displays full job details, applications, actions like apply/assign/complete, and rating and payout handling.
frontend/src/pages/JobListPage.tsx: Lists jobs filtered by user role, showing status, pay, and key job info with navigation to details.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile viewer/editor with job activity stats, payout info, and principal copying.
frontend/src/pages/RoleSelectPage.tsx: Initial profile setup page for choosing name, phone, and user role before onboarding.
frontend/src/pages/SplashPage.tsx: Landing page introducing the app with branding and login flow kickoff via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning values from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, spacing, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state metadata, architectural notes, features, and requirements for a two‑sided job marketplace app.
